wikipedia_page.main: Brian Athol Jordan (31 January 1932 – 27 December 2018) was an English professional footballer who played as a half-back in the Football League for Rotherham United, Middlesbrough and York City, in non-League football for Denaby United, and was on the books of Derby County without making a league appearance.He died in 2018.

response: Jordan serves as a TV pre-game analyst for the Atlanta Braves on Braves Live, the official pregame show on FSN South and SportSouth. He is active in the Atlanta community with the Brian Jordan Foundation and authored the semi-autobiographical children's book I Told You I Can Play!
* 27 December 2018: Brian Jordan, 86, Rotherham United, Middlesbrough and York City half back.
